item.title: Isorhythm
item.description: Pure Data and Max For Live implementations of isorhythm sequencing. Isorhythm on Wikipedia The idea here is to decouple a melody’s rhythm events and sequence of pitches. Then the number of rhythm events and pitches can be different, and we iterate through pitches on each rhythm event.
